extendedInfo.description: Ready to be the best penalty kicker in the football field? Tap the football to make a banana kick, and hit the target as accurate as possible! Challenge the world by submitting score to global leaderboard.# Better control.# Bug fix.

reviews.title: Fun and accurate
reviews.comment: Addictive and fun accurate game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun & uncomplicated. The 24 hr high score format is sensational. It is always possible to score a top 20 world record, so I keep coming back for more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not responsive
reviews.comment: I just installed this game and first game was good but then this game is not responding. I cant see the ball to hit the goal...whole screen is blank... No use for me... Uninstalling.. Fix it and then I can try it out later...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use To Love It!
reviews.comment: This is one of those absolutely simple games that becomes addictive! I loved this game....that is until the last update. Now the game doesnt work. Its just a screen with a goal niet, no soccer balls or targets. Fix it....Please!
reviews.author: R.J. Rios

reviews.title: so fun and easy!
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game. It\'s better if you use your thumb to flick the ball instead of your index finger, but still a fun game though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Soccer
reviews.comment: I like this game but if you play it over 5 minutes it gets boring
reviews.author: Annalyn Summers

reviews.title: Nice simple game for the killing of time.
reviews.comment: Good Its good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Harder than it looks. Great time water, but still a great way to pass the time.

reviews.title: It is fun.
reviews.comment: It is so simple not very challenging, but if I have some time to spare it can help killing time waiting for something.  I can get perfect score in short time.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work in jelly bean
reviews.comment: It was a really fun game, but currently it doesn\'t work in jelly bean :(

reviews.title: Its cool
reviews.comment: Simple fun. Worth checking out but probably not going to keep you entertained too long

reviews.comment: It is extremly boring do not download this app they should make the game without a target and a goalie instead.!

reviews.comment: Please fix the bugs. Game doesn\'t load correctly. Tends to have a black screen. Thank you.

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t have the big problem when the object is at the center, you cannot control the ball, when the object is at the center....fix that......

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: just alright I don\'t know if it\'s worth a download.  The controls are still hard to control for accuracy. But fun in worth the download that lease to explore.

reviews.comment: Its ok. I mean its not really that fun because theres no objective and you always get the same number of balls. Nothing fun about it......
